| icon           = poe2 aquamarine icon.png
| description    = Named for the sea, these beryl stones boast brilliant blue sufaces. Often found loose along rocky shores, aquamarine has traditionally been associated by the dwarves of Old Vailia with both Ondra and Abydon. As a result, shipwrights, captains, and sailors all prize these stones as good luck charms.

* [Serpent's Crown](/serpentsCrown/): Sold by [Una](/una/) in the daytime.
* Can be looted from dead [Storm blight](/stormBlight/).
* Can be gained during a scripted interaction in [Poko Kohara ruins](/pokoKoharaRuins/).
